Query: How to convert a m4a sound file to mp3?

Answers.MP Summary: encode audio into the Opus format
Answers.Most Similar TLDR Task: Convert 5.1 surround sound audio at the highest quality level
Top-3 Similar Questions: au_211054: How to convert a sound file to Opus
Top-3 Scripts:
au_211054: opusenc input.wav output.opus

ffmpeg -i input.mp3 -f wav - | opusenc --bitrate 256 - output.opus

Top-3 Similar Questions: au_95753: Convert lossless m4a to flac
ul_438927: Convert all found m4a to mp3
su_668766: Unable to convert m4a to mp3
Top-3 Scripts:
au_95753: sudo apt-get install ffmpeg

ffmpeg -i filein.m4a -f flac fileout.flac

ul_438927: find . -name '*.m4a' -print0 | while read -d '' -r file; do
  ffmpeg -i "$file" -n -acodec libmp3lame -ab 128k "${file%.m4a}.mp3" < /dev/null
done

Explanations about Options.-acodec: Set the audio codec. This is an alias for "-codec:a".
Explanations about Options.-aq: Set the audio quality (codec-specific, VBR). This is an alias for -q:a.
Explanations about Options.-n:
Do not overwrite output files, and exit immediately if a specified output file already
 exists.
